segments.text: Hello , so how are we feeling today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Things are going well for me , Dr . Smith .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Am I correct in thinking that you are here for your annual physical ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am applying for new health insurance , and I need a physical examination to qualify .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your basic physical exam will include lungs , heart , blood levels , and eyes , ears , and nose .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I â€™ Ve been having a little trouble breathing . Would you look into that , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can do an allergy test , and later I can send you for an asthma test .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would appreciate it . When you give me a blood test , what are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am going to check your cholesterol , blood sugar , and white blood cell count .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am expecting the tests to go well . I have been taking good care of myself .
segments.speaker: S2
